data.name: TERMINS1
data.value:
1. Terms of the agreement

The terms of the agreement governing the relationship between user and Route , (hereinafter "the administrator" regarding the use of the platform and related services (the " Service ").

THE ADMINISTRATOR is a Colombian company. user you can contact us via e-mail info@citiesfor.life.

By creating an account or accessing or using the Service, you accept and be bound by these Terms of Service and expressly consent to the collection, use and storage of your information as described in the Privacy Policy in this document.

THE ADMINISTRATOR is the exclusive owner of the intellectual property rights relating to the design of the website and the information contained therein, including the appearance of color combinations, button shapes, other graphical elements website and the feeling they convey. This intellectual property is protected by copyright laws, trademarks, patents and trade secrets and other intellectual property rights.

2. Access the service

all natural persons over 18 may participate.

The user must provide all equipment and software necessary to connect to the Service, including but not limited to, a mobile device, in cases where the service offers a mobile component. The user is responsible for any charges, including the Internet or mobile fees that you incur when accessing the service.

3. Using the service

To participate in the platform CITIES FOR LIFE you can enter with your Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn. If you do not have any of these social networks you can register in the form of the platform entering the following information: full name, phone or cell phone, email, city profile photo (optional) and accept the terms and conditions and policy Platform privacy.

Once registered you can participate in the following manner:

a. Publish challenges. challenges will be published regularly on the platform where users must publish ideas and proposals that respond to the challenge posed. A challenge is a question that is published on the platform and aims to find innovative and feasible proposals to develop in cities by area of impact defined solution.

How to win a City Challenge?
Associated budget City Challenge will be used to carry out the idea later. For the election of the idea that possibly will take place the following will be considered:

  • The user must be part of the Top 10.
  • Then Route choose the best idea of the Top 10 according to a committee [JJ2] to discuss the idea and its viability (The committee will consider whether you can carry out the winning idea) .
  • The City Challenge winner was subsequently published in the blog of the challenge.
  • In the absence of a winner, be informed of the reason why there was no winner.

    b. Answer questions
    THE ADMINISTRATOR will ask citizens for their ideas can contribute to building a better city. Open, multiple-choice questions to select points location on a map of Medellin: three (3) types of questions will be asked.

    c. Other actions within the platform
    You may also:

    • Discuss ideas or answers to other users.
    • Give "Like" (little hand up) to the ideas and comments of other users.
    • Give "I hate" (little hand below) to the ideas and comments of other users.
    • Share the contents of the platform in social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn) and email.
    • Edit profile where you can edit or add the following information:
      • Biography - Tell us about yourself (visible to other users) .
      • document type and document number (will not be visible to other users).
      • or cell phone. (It will not be visible to other users).
      • E-mail. (It will not be visible to other users).
      • Location. (It will not be visible to other users).
      • New password.
      • Stock profile (optional).
      • Interests.
      • Link to your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn).

        d. Versus section
        This section will test two (2) ideas and answers posted by users randomly so that others vote for the ones they like.

        e. Earn points
        Some actions within the platform virtual points will be awarded to the user in order to stand out in the "Citizens are participating" section.

        f. Enter the TOP 10 and section the best of the best
        To enter the Top 10 user defined formula, thus:

        • ideas or questions with the most views, most "Like" minus the amount of "I hate" plus the number of comments. The total of this formula defines users who enter this section.
        • To enter the most innovative "Best of the Best" platform, will be taken into account those users with the most points on an idea.
        • To enter the most popular ideas in "The Best of the Best" platform the amount of "Like" minus the amount of "I hate" will add a user.
        • To enter the most voted ideas in "The best of the best" amount of "Like" on an idea will be added.

          g. Report a content
          On every idea or answer another user platform may report it to the administrator if it deems inappropriate. To do this you must enter the report button on the idea or question and write the reason considers inappropriate content. THE ADMINISTRATOR determine what to do with the content.

          4. License to use the service

          The user can only use the service and content provided by this website for non-commercial purposes while respecting the opinions of others and these conditions of use. Therefore, the user agrees to not use the Service for any other purpose.

          You not use data collection tools (data mining), robots or similar tools to gather and extract data content, frame any part of the website or its contents, as well as reproduce, reprint, copy, store, publicly display, issue , transmit, modify, translate, reschedule, publish, sublicense, assign, transfer, sell, loan or otherwise distribute the content without prior written consent of THE ADMINISTRATOR . It is forbidden to circumvent the mechanisms included in the content to prevent unauthorized distribution or reproduction of content.

          THE ADMINISTRATOR may require upgrades of the service. You acknowledge and agree that THE ADMINISTRATOR can update the Service with or without notice. You acknowledge and agree that you may need to update third-party software from time to time in order to receive service.

          5. Restrictions

          The following restrictions apply to the use of the Service:

          • Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn does not sponsor, endorse, or managed in any way this platform, or are associated with it.
          • According to the regulation of Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn a person can only have one profile, so users can not participate with more than one Facebook profile within the platform.
          • To access the service, the user must be 13 years.
          • You should monitor your account to restrict use by minors, and denied access to children under 13 years. The user accepts full responsibility for any unauthorized use of the service by minors in relation to your account.
          • The user is responsible for his opinions, as such, is committed to respect the opinions of others. The views of users do not represent the feelings of THE ADMINISTRATOR .
          • The user will use the platform exclusively for non-commercial purposes, avoiding political or other proselytizing.
          • You may not use the Service to engage in any illegal conduct.
          • If the user accesses the service must comply with these Terms of Service.
          • The user is responsible for the images or content shared through the platform, for that reason holds harmless THE ADMINISTRATOR for any claims relating to copyright and intellectual property.
          • The user will not share any video you put music on the platform.

            6. License limitations

data.name: LONGTEXT
data.value:
PRIVACY AND PERSONAL DATA PRIVACY POLICY

For participation in the platform, Route , acting as a data controller collects personal information such as: name, last name, email, username and password.

Route collects and uses personal information for self-service management of the page to provide users with information services and promotion. Similarly, Route makes use of personal data to inform the user about available content. Route not put up for sale, rent or lease to others registered their lists on their pages. However, you may occasionally contact you on behalf of certain external partners and / or to inform you about a particular offering that may be of interest, always related to the subject of this page. In these cases, the user's personal information (name, phone, email, city, profile picture, biography, document type, document number, interest, or other private information) is not transferred to third parties.

Route can be collected in the database for use within the platform and promotional activities, sensitive data (those that affect the privacy of the owner or whose misuse can lead to discrimination), such as data biometric. In this case Route provides for use in accordance with constitutional principles in Colombia and respect for fundamental rights.

Additionally, Route informs the user as owner of the data enjoys the rights provided in the Constitution of Colombia and the law, especially the right to know, update, rectify and delete your personal information; and the right to revoke consent to the processing of personal data and all rights established by Law 1581 (Law on Protection of Personal Data) 2012 and Decree 1377 of 2013.

Route is committed to protecting the security of personal information by using technologies and security procedures that guarantee the protection of information from unauthorized access, disclosure, and unauthorized use, likewise, will use the data , particularly those of minors, in accordance with constitutional principles, respect for fundamental rights and interests of minors, if you have any concerns about this, you can send an email to: info@citiesfor.life

Based on the above, as a participant user or parent or guardian of the minor participant:

  • I agree expressly voluntary, prior, explicit, informed and unequivocal the collection, storage and use of personal data, as well as minor I represent.
  • I agree to receive promotional information by registered mail.
  • I declare that the information provided is true, accurate and current.
  • I understand and agree that the personal data and other information provided by the participant will be automatically processed and incorporated into the database managed by the corporation Route .
  • give my free, express and informed that the personal information that has been entered is stored, collected or used by Route directly or through third parties, for communication, sending information and / or marketing.

    If the user wants to unsubscribe from this platform, to ask for any modification, correction or deletion of all data you have given us, to stop receiving commercial information and contact us for any other reason, you can send an email to info @ citiesfor.life

    I acknowledge that I have read and understand the above terms of use and agree that my use of the platform is a recognition of my ACCEPTANCE OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS TERMS OF USE AGREEMENT.

    Privacy

    Your privacy is important to us. By accepting this Privacy Policy you agree that your information is accessed and used for your account (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn), the data to be used as follows:

    • Full name, which will be shown to other users
    • Your age, which will be consulted to verify the age of the user
    • The account ID (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn), which will be stored to save the user's progress in the application.

      You agree to provide accurate and complete information, and it will update the information as soon as possible after changes. You understand that your user ID, full name, biography, links to social networks and profile photo will be available to the public and that the search engines can index your name and profile photo.

      No information will be distributed to third parties and the only information that will be stored until the user communicates through a message that you want your account to be removed, will be the id of the account (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn).

      The user is solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of information access, and be responsible for all uses of your login information.

      Changes to the terms of service and privacy policy

      Route reserves the right, at its discretion, to change, modify, add or remove portions of these terms of service at any time by posting the amended terms on or within the service. You can also give notice of any change to an email or messaging within the service. It is deemed to have accepted these changes if you continue to use the service. Unless otherwise stated, all amended terms shall automatically be effective after its initial publication.

      The co-creation platform CITIES FOR LIFE always have a link with the latest version of the terms and conditions, you are responsible to check the terms and conditions periodically for changes that could affect had. Continued use of the website following the amendment of the terms and conditions of use, you accept implicitly.

data.name: TERANDCON
data.value:
TERMS OF USE CITIES PLATFORM FOR LIFE

Please read the following terms of use (the "Terms of Use" or "Agreement") before you start using the services offered on "co-creation platform CITIES FOR LIFE".

Summary of the co-creation platform CITIES FOR LIFE

Platform where representatives of cities and the world can participate by contributing ideas on the challenges and questions raised in the platform through text, images and videos to music no.

1. Terms of the agreement

The terms of the agreement governing the relationship between user and Route , (hereinafter "the administrator" regarding the use of the platform and related services (the " Service ").

THE ADMINISTRATOR is a Colombian company. user you can contact us via e-mail info@citiesfor.life.

By creating an account or accessing or using the Service, you accept and be bound by these Terms of Service and expressly consent to the collection, use and storage of your information as described in the Privacy Policy in this document.

THE ADMINISTRATOR is the exclusive owner of the intellectual property rights relating to the design of the website and the information contained therein, including the appearance of color combinations, button shapes, other graphical elements website and the feeling they convey. This intellectual property is protected by copyright laws, trademarks, patents and trade secrets and other intellectual property rights.

2. Access the service

all individuals older than 18 years can participate.

The user must provide all equipment and software necessary to connect to the Service, including but not limited to, a mobile device, in cases where the service offers a mobile component. The user is responsible for any charges, including the Internet or mobile tariffs incurred to access the service.

3. Using the service

To participate in the platform CITIES FOR LIFE you can enter with your Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn. If you do not have any of these social networks you can register in the form of platform by entering the following information: full name, phone or cell phone, email, city profile photo (optional) and accept the terms and conditions and policy Privacy of the platform.

Once registered you can participate in the following manner:

a. Publish challenges. challenges will be published regularly on the platform where users must publish ideas and proposals that respond to the challenge posed. A challenge is a question that is published on the platform and aims to find innovative and viable proposals to develop in cities by area of ​​impact defined solution.

How to win a City Challenge?
Associated budget City Challenge will be used to carry out the idea later. For the election of the idea that possibly will take place the following will be considered:

  • The user must be part of the Top 10.
  • Then Route choose the best idea of ​​the Top 10 according to a committee [JJ2] to discuss the idea and its viability (The committee will consider whether you can carry out the winning idea) .
  • The City Challenge winner was subsequently published in the blog of the challenge.
  • In the absence of a winner, be informed of the reason why there was no winner.

    b. Answer questions
    THE ADMINISTRATOR will ask to for their ideas can contribute to building a better city. Open, multiple-choice questions to select points location on a map of Medellin: three (3) types of questions will be asked.

    c. Other actions within the platform
    You may also:

    • Discuss ideas or answers to other users.
    • Give "Like" (Manito above) to the ideas and comments of other users.
    • Give "I hate" (little hand below) to the ideas and comments of other users.
    • Share the contents of the platform in social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn) and email.
    • Edit profile where you can edit or add the following information:
      • Biography - Tell us about yourself (visible to other users) .
      • document type and document number (will not be visible to other users).
      • or cell phone. (It will not be visible to other users).
      • E-mail. (It will not be visible to other users).
      • Location. (It will not be visible to other users).
      • New password.
      • Stock profile (optional).
      • Interests.
      • Link to your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn).

        d. Versus section
        This section will test two (2) ideas and answers posted by users randomly so that others vote for the ones they like.

        e. Earn points
        Some actions within the platform virtual points will be awarded to the user in order to stand out in the "Citizens are participating" section.

        f. Enter the TOP 10 and section the best of the best
        To enter the Top 10 user defined formula, thus:

        • ideas or questions with the most views, most "Like" minus the amount of "I hate" plus the number of comments. The total of this formula defines users who enter this section.
        • To enter the most innovative "Best of the Best" platform, will be taken into account those users with the most points on an idea.
        • To enter the most popular ideas in "The Best of the Best" platform the amount of "Like" minus the amount of "I hate" will add a user.
        • To enter the most voted ideas in "The best of the best" amount of "Like" on an idea will be added.

          g. Report content
          On every idea or answer another user platform may report it to the administrator if it deems inappropriate. To do this you must enter the report button on the idea or question and write the reason considers inappropriate content. THE ADMINISTRATOR determine what to do with the content.

          4. License to use the service

          The user can only use the service and content provided by this website for non-commercial purposes while respecting the opinions of others and these conditions of use. Therefore, the user agrees to not use the Service for any other purpose.

          You not use data collection tools (data mining), robots or similar tools to gather and extract data content, frame any part of the website or its contents, as well as reproduce, reprint, copy, store, publicly display, issue , transmit, modify, translate, reschedule, publish, sublicense, assign, transfer, sell, loan or otherwise distribute the content without prior written consent of THE ADMINISTRATOR . It is forbidden to circumvent the mechanisms included in the content to prevent unauthorized distribution or reproduction of content.

          THE ADMINISTRATOR may require upgrades of the service. You acknowledge and agree that THE ADMINISTRATOR can update the Service with or without notice. You acknowledge and agree that you may need to update third-party software from time to time in order to receive service.

          5. Restrictions

          The following restrictions apply to the use of the Service:

          • Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn does not sponsor, endorse, or managed in any way this platform, or are associated with it.
          • According to the regulation of Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn a person can only have one profile, so users can not participate with more than one Facebook profile within the platform.
          • To access the service, the user must be 13 years.
          • You should monitor your account to restrict use by minors, and denied access to children under 13 years. The user accepts full responsibility for any unauthorized use of the service by minors in relation to your account.
          • The user is responsible for his opinions, as such, is committed to respect the opinions of others. The views of users do not represent the feelings of THE ADMINISTRATOR .
          • The user will use the platform exclusively for non-commercial purposes, avoiding political or other proselytizing.
          • You may not use the Service to engage in any illegal conduct.
          • If the user accesses the service must comply with these Terms of Service.
          • The user is responsible for the content or sharing images via the platform, for that reason holds harmless ADMINISTRATOR for any claims relating to copyright and intellectual property.
          • The user will not share any video you put music on the platform.

            6. License limitations

            Any attempt to disrupt or interfere with the service, is a violation of these terms of use and may be a violation of criminal and civil norms. By accepting these terms of use, you agree that under no circumstances:

            • use the service to promote the violation of any applicable law or regulation.
            • will use cheats, exploits, automation software, bots, hacks mods or any other unauthorized third-party software designed to modify or interfere with the Service or modify the files that are part of the service.
            • modify the files that are part of the service.
            • Perform actions to disrupt, overburden, aid or assist in the interruption or overload any computer or server used to offer or support the Service.
            • Help or participate in any type of attack, including without limitation distributing a virus, denial of service attacks on the Service, or other attempts to disrupt service or use of any other person or enjoyment of the service.
            • Attempt to obtain unauthorized access to the Service, recorded for other accounts or computers, servers, or networks connected to the Service by any means of the user interface networks, including but not limiting, access circumvent or modify, in an attempt to prevent or modify, or encouraging or assisting any other person to circumvent or modify any security technology, device or software that is part of the Service.
            • Publish threatening, obscene, defamatory, libelous, or racial, sexual, religious or otherwise objectionable or offensive information.
            • Publish any information that contains nudity, excessive violence, or offensive subject matter or contains a link to the content.
            • Do not attempt to harass, abuse, or harm another person.
            • Make available through the Service any material or information that infringes any copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, right of privacy, right of publicity, or other rights of any person or entity.
            • Transmit unauthorized communications through the Service, including junk mail, chain letters, junk mail and materials that promote the elements of malware, spyware and downloadable.
            • use any unauthorized third-party software that accesses, intercepts, or otherwise collects information from or through the service or who are in transit to or from the Service, including without limitation any software that reads areas RAM or streams of network traffic.
            • void all robot exclusion headers or other measures we use to restrict access to the service or use any software, technology or device to send content or messages, scrape, spider, or crawl the Service, or harvest or manipulate data.

              14. Data protection and personal data privacy

              For participation in the platform Route , acting as a data controller collects personal information such as: Name, Last Name, Email, and Password.

              Route collects and uses personal information for self-service management of the page to provide users with information services and promotion. Similarly, Route makes use of personal data to inform the user about available content. Route not put up for sale, rent or lease to others registered their lists on their pages. However, you may occasionally contact you on behalf of external business partners and / or for any Route in order to inform you about a particular offering that may be of interest, always linked to the subject of this page. In these cases, the user's personal information (name, cell phone, email, city, profile picture, biography, document type, document number, interests) is not transferred to third parties.

              Route can be collected in the database for use within the platform and promotional activities sensitive data (those that affect the privacy of the owner or whose misuse can lead to discrimination), such as biometrics, in this case Route guarantees use according to constitutional principles and respect for fundamental rights.

              Additionally Route informs the user as holder of the data enjoys the rights provided in the Constitution and the law, especially the right to know, update, rectify and delete your personal information; and the right to revoke consent to the processing of personal data and all rights established by Law 1581 of 2012 and Decree 1377 of 2013.

              Route is committed to protecting the security of personal information by using technologies and security procedures that guarantee the protection of information from unauthorized access, disclosure, and unauthorized use, likewise, will use the data , particularly those of minors, according to constitutional principles, respect for fundamental rights and interests of minors, if you have any concerns about this, you can send an email to info@citiesfor.life.

                If the user wishes to withdraw from this platform, to ask for any modification, correction or deletion of all data provided to us, to stop receiving commercial information and contact us for any other reason, you can send an email to info @ citiesfor .life

                I acknowledge that I have read and understand the above terms of use and agree that my use of the platform is a recognition of my ACCEPTANCE OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS TERMS OF USE AGREEMENT.

                15. Privacy policy

                Your privacy is important to us. By accepting this Privacy Policy you agree that your information is accessed and used for your account (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn), the data to be used as follows:

                • Full name, which will be shown to other users
                • Your age, which will be consulted to verify the age of the user
                • The account ID (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn), which will be stored to save the user's progress in the application.

                  You agree to provide accurate and complete information, and it will update the information as soon as possible after changes. You understand that your user ID, full name, biography, links to social networks and profile photo will be available to the public and that the search engines can index your name and profile photo.

                  No information will be distributed to third parties and the only information that will be stored until the user communicates through a message that you want your account to be removed, will be the id of the account (Facebook, Twitter, Google + and LinkedIn).

                  The user is solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of information access, and be responsible for all uses of your login information.

Continued use of the website following the amendment of the terms and conditions of use, you accept implicitly.
